Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back Awesome Adventures - Yasawa Flyer Awesome Adventures - Kayaking Awesome Adventures - Sunset Tubing Awesome Adventures - Manta Ray Awesome Adventures - SUP Awesome Adventures - SUP Fiji Awesome Adventures - 4D/3N Tropical Tempter 3 Nights • Transfers • Sightseeing Overview Inclusions Terms & Conditions 4D/3N Tropical Tempter As an all-inclusive package, the Tropical Tempter is an ideal choice for those looking to experience the Yasawa Islands with exciting activities included. In just four days, you can check off some major bucket list adventures View more View less 3 nights + transfers, sightseeing & more from $ 1279 per person share twin. Flights are additional. Enquire now Sale Period : until 31 Mar 26 by 4pm or until sold out Deal Includes: 1 night accommodation South Sea Island in a private bure 2 nights accommodation in Manta region, in private bure (specific hotel based on availability at time of booking) Return transfers to Port Denarau from most Nadi, Wailoaloa & Denarau hotels Return South Sea Cruises vessel transfers from Port Denarau and around the Yasawa Islands FREE activities at South Sea Island including semi sub, drinks included from 9.45am-4pm (local beer, house wine & soft drinks) Sightseeing tour at Manta Ray region accommodation Bonus: Day pass to Malamala Beach Club to use either pre/post of your package FREE Awesome Adventures Pack including Sulu, drink bottle and drawstring day pack Travel Dates & Pricing From $1279 per person share twin Based on travel between 01 Apr 25-31 Mar 26 Departs daily, year round Pricing is subject to current availability and pricing may change without notice. Meals not included to be purchased on island Itinerary Day 1 Depart Port Denarau for South Sea Island where you have complimentary full use of all the non-motorised watersports activities on this action-packed little island! Your stay here also includes drinks (local beer, house wine, and soft drinks) from 9:45am to 4.00pm. Accommodation: Mamanuca Region Day 2 On the morning of day 2, travel to the Manta Ray Region on board the vessel. During your stay here you have 2 activities included so make sure to book these in as soon as you check in at your resort. The highlight of course will be a swim with the majestic manta ray (May-Oct) or a guided reef snorkeling trip. Accommodation: Manta Ray Region Day 3 On your last day in the region, why not do a sunrise summit hike to take in the expansive views, go kayaking, paddle boarding or just relax on the beach before boarding the vessel in the late afternoon for the cruise back to Port Denarau arriving at 6.00pm. Day 4 Depart your Manta Ray region accommodation to return to Port Denarau Terms & Conditions Sales to 31 Mar 26 or until sold out. Prices correct as at 29 Apr 25. • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation. Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases and availability. • Package prices for accommodation and transfers are land only. International and domestic flights are additional. All travel must be commenced and completed as specified. • Meals at resorts are not included, must be paid direct at the resort. • All activities will be based on activities provided at the hotel confirmed in the final itinerary and may be substituted for an alternative should they not be available or operational upon clients arrival. • Accommodation will be assigned at time of booking depending on what is available. • The bonus day pass to Malamala Beach Club can be used either pre/post this package. • Bedding configurations may vary. • Min/max stays apply. • Full payment is required at time of booking. • Availability during holiday & peak travel periods may be limited. • Amendment and cancellation fees apply. • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property. • Packages are subject to availability. Please talk to your House of Travel consultant for the most up to date availability and pricing. Advertised prices are per person (twin share) based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply. FINANCE CONDITIONS: Lending criteria, fees, terms & conditions apply. Offer available for bookings made with House of Travel only. Not available for bookings made with MixandMatch. For finance terms and conditions visit hot.co.nz/payment-options.
